remarks: Value of commutes relation.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
cmtfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cmtfval.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cmtfval.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cmtfval.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
cmtfval.c $e |- C = ( cm ` K ) $.
cmtfvalN $p |- ( K e. A -> C = { <. x , y >. | ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ x = ( ( x ./\ y ) .\/ ( x ./\ ( ._|_ ` y ) ) ) ) } ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d K x y $.
